contest-event.event-date:
June 23, 1900 D Halifax contest
Halifax Contest 5 Other Halifax Contest halifax-contest
Test Piece Contest
Oberon [arr. Round]
Spring Hall, Halifax Promoted by the five Halifax borough brass bands. March contest - 1st Copley and Skircoat, 2nd King Cross. Best cornet - Angus Holden (Copley) Best euphonium - Copley Best trombone and horn - King Cross. Prizes: £8, £5, £3, £2, 31
Nov. 4, 2011, 6:58 p.m. April 2, 2020, 12:40 p.m.
1 Halifax King Cross Squire Firth
2 Lee Mount Unknown
3 Copley and Skircoat Angus Holden
4 Halifax Victoria Unknown
